title: Carring Capacity of the Problem
text: In this problem, the carrying capacity is $$68$$.

title: Using the Intersect Feature On a Calculator
text: Graph $$y=34$$ and $$y=\frac{68}{1+16e^{-0.028 x}}$$. Then, find the $$x$$ coordinate of their intersection by going to the calculate menu, selecting the intersect option, and identifying the two different $$\frac{curves}{lines}$$ on the graph.
speech: Graph  y is equal to 34  and  y, is equal to fraction, 68 over, 1 plus, 16, e raised to the negative 0.028 x power  . Then, find the  x  coordinate of their intersection by going to the calculate menu, selecting the intersect option, and identifying the two different  curves over lines  on the graph.
